pages.text: $(li)The Nature's Compass is a new variant of the $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/compass)Compass$(/l) that can be used to find different Biomes.$(br)$(li)This will help you to find Creatures or Structures.
$(li)First, just right click while you are holding the Nature's Compass in your hand.
$(li)Then search a Biome, using the searchbox, and the Sort options.
$(li)Now, select it and click the $(l)Start Search$() button to start the Biome Search.
$(li)When the search ends, the Nature's Compass will be indicanting the distance of the selected Biome.
$(li)The needle of this compass will indicate the path to the selected Biome.
